snippet: BECK--Esther, passed away on April 2, 2016 after a lengthy illness. She is survived by two children, a daughter-in-law, four grandchildren and three great-grandchildren. She was very loved by her family and will be very much missed. Funeral Services will be held on Monday, April 4th, at 11am at Sutton Place Synagogue, 225 East 51st Street. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BECK--Esther, passed away on April 2, 2016 after a lengthy illness. She is survived by two children, a daughter-in-law, four grandchildren and three great-grandchildren. She was very loved by her family and will be very much missed. Funeral Services will be held on Monday, April 4th, at 11am at Sutton Place Synagogue, 225 East 51st Street. 1/3
